description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Blazingly fast addictive arcade madness! Help Granny get as far as possible over several distinct landscapes. Collect food to build up boost and then "let rip" to blast your way to the next checkpoint.  Collect misc. items for big scores.   How far can you get? How high can you score?
